originalText.text: Dr Duperval really helped me in more ways than she knows. She took my fibroids problem very seriously and immediately stepped into action with getting me ready for surgery. I would recommend her to everyone. She also did a colposcopy which I was very nervous about but she made it a breeze! She was very informative and kind. The office is clean but small and in a very private setting. The front desk ladies are so kind and welcoming. I am definitely keeping this doctor. I can’t wait to see her after my surgery so I can thank her!

originalText.text: I was so excited to get in with Dr. Duperval, unfortunately, she didn’t live up to her reviews. Perhaps, she has more patients than she can realistically tend to. Whenever I get a test done I have to call the office for weeks to get the results. She didn’t seem to be interested in any of my concerns, the experience was lackluster. Find someone else.

originalText.text: Dr Duperval is really sweet, kind and gentle with my 19 year old daughter.  She gives her all the facts in a caring but informative way.  I believe my daughter is in great hands under Dr Duperval's care.

originalText.text: Dr. Duperval is a phenomenal doctor!  She listens extensively to all of your concerns and works WITH you on what the best solution is for your treatment or issue.  Her bedside manner is impeccable. She is kind, caring and genuinely cares for your well being.  I highly recommend this doctor! I recently moved out of state and am now searching for a comparable doctor in my area which has not been easy!  She is magnificent.

originalText.text: Dr. Duperval is extremely professional and goes above and beyond for her patients. She is very thorough and knowledgeable in her area of expertise. Her office is clean, the staff are welcoming and the wait times are quick. Thank you for always taking care of me and putting my needs first. I appreciate you and everything you do to take care of the women in our community. I would highly recommend Dr. Duperval as she is very good at what she does.
